casebody.data:
2001-2951 (La. 10/14/02)

STATE of Louisiana v. Gary GERARD. No. 2001-KH-2951. Supreme Court of Louisiana. Oct. 14, 2002.

In re GARY GERARD; Applying for Reconsideration of this Court’s order dated August 30, 2002; Parish of Jefferson, 24th. Judicial District Court Div. E, No. 98-7104; to the Court of Appeal, Fifth Circuit, No. 01-KH-1037.

Reconsideration denied.
